response.original_title: Heifetz in High Performance - Red Seal Legendary Visions DVD Documentary
response.overview: A documentary showcasing some legendary performances from Jascha Heifetz and talks a bit about his life and teaching.  Includes the following pieces: - Rondo by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart - March by Sergei Prokofiev - La Fille Aux Cheveax de Lin (The Girl with the Flaxen Hair) by Claude Debussy - Daisies by Sergei Rachmaninoff - It Ain't Necessarily So by George Gershwin - Chaconne by Johann Sebastian Bach - Scottish Fantasy op.46 by Max Bruch
response.title: Heifetz in High Performance - Red Seal Legendary Visions DVD Documentary
